ProfileName: M. M. Maynard "The Truth is Out There"
Summary: Ok to use 6 months after expiration
text: Not too acidic, not too bitter -very well balanced. Have used wtih no problem at 6 months after expiration date on package. Just seemed a little "clumpy" at that point but tasted fine.  Much better value per unit than smaller packaging.  I ordered off the Starbucks site directly at this price, didn't notice a short expiration so wonder if it is Amazon fulfillment issue?
